name: identitytoolkit_accounts_mfaEnrollment_finalize
description: Finishes enrolling a second factor for the user.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

GoogleCloudIdentitytoolkitV2FinalizeMfaE.description: Finishes enrolling a second factor for the user.

displayName.description: Display name which is entered by users to distinguish between different second factors with same type or different type.

tenantId.description: The ID of the Identity Platform tenant that the user enrolling MFA belongs to. If not set, the user belongs to the default Identity Platform project.

GoogleCloudIdentitytoolkitV2FinalizeMfaP.description: Phone Verification info for a FinalizeMfa request.

androidVerificationProof.description: Android only. Uses for "instant" phone number verification though GmsCore.

phoneNumber.description: Required if Android verification proof is presented.

sessionInfo.description: An opaque string that represents the enrollment session.

GoogleCloudIdentitytoolkitV2FinalizeMfaT.description: Mfa request info specific to TOTP auth for FinalizeMfa.

sessionInfo.description: An opaque string that represents the enrollment session.

$ul: **idToken**: ID token updated to reflect MFA enrollment.
**phoneAuthInfo**: Phone Verification info for a FinalizeMfa response.
**androidVerificationProof**: Android only. Long-lived replacement for valid code tied to android device.
**androidVerificationProofExpireTime**: Android only. Expiration time of verification proof in seconds.
**refreshToken**: Refresh token updated to reflect MFA enrollment.
**totpAuthInfo**: Mfa response info specific to TOTP auth for FinalizeMfa.
